name: Enchanted Weapon Set / 呪われシリーズ武器セット/ 詛咒系列武器套組 / Ensemble Armes Enchantées
detailed_description:
Feelin' enchanted? With The Enchanted Weapon Set, your favorite Neptunia characters will get a boost in vitality and mentality!

The Enchanted Weapon Set include:
• Enchanted Sword: Neptune Only
• Enchanted Blade: Noire Only
• Enchanted Axe: Blanc Only
• Enchanted Spear: Vert Only
• Enchanted Card Set: Chrome Only

*Note: Weapons are visible during battle and cutscenes.
about_the_game:

short_description: The Enchanted Weapon Set includes 5x weapons for the Neptunia gang!

fullgame.name: Super Neptunia RPG / 勇者ネプテューヌ /勇者戰幾少女

supported_languages:
English*, French, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 32bit, 64bit (DirectX 12 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit (DirectX 12 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
